command.addlang.description: Add one of your known languages
command.removelang.description: Remove one of your known languages
command.listlang.description: List your known languages and all available languages
language.error.maxLanguages: You cannot learn more than {0} languages
language.notification.none: You now know no languages! If you try to speak, you will only {0} incoherently!
language.notification.newDefault: You unlearned your default language, your new default is {0}
language.error.playerMax: {0} cannot learn more than {1} languages! Remove one first.
language.notification.playerNone: {0} now knows no languages! If they try to speak, they will only {1} incoherently!
language.notification.playerNoDefault: {0} unlearned their default language, but no valid default language was found!
language.notification.playerNewDefault: {0} unlearned their default language, their new default is {1}
language.transformer.invalid: Invalid language specifier {0}. Valid prefixes include: {1}
heritage.class.gain: Your {0} background grants you knowledge of {1}.
heritage.class.loss: You no longer benefit from your {0} background for {1}.
heritage.trait.gain: Your traits grant you knowledge of {0}.
heritage.trait.loss: You no longer benefit from your traits for {0}.
heritage.model.gain: Your {0} form grants you knowledge of {1}.
heritage.model.loss: You no longer have access to {1} as a {0}.
rp.command.adminsetnickname.description: Admin: Get or set another player's nickname. Use 'force' before the nickname to bypass conflict warnings.
rp.command.adminsetnickcolor.description: Admin: Get or set another player's nickname color
rp.command.emotemode.description: Turn Emote-only mode on or off
rp.command.rptext.description: Turn the whole RP system on or off for your messages
rp.command.yell.description: Set your chat mode to Yelling, or yell a single message
rp.command.say.description: Set your chat mode back to normal, or say a single message
rp.command.whisper.description: Set your chat mode to Whispering, or whisper a single message
rp.nickcolor.admin.noColor: Player {0} does not have a nickname color! You can set it with `/adminsetnickcolor {0} NewColor`
rp.nickcolor.admin.set: Player {0} nickname color has been set to: {1}. Old nickname color: {2}
rp.nickcolor.self.noColor: You don't have a color set! You can set it with `/nickcolor [color]`
rp.nickname.error.none: You don't have a nickname! You can set it with `/nick MyName`
rp.nickname.error.conflict: The nickname '{0}' is already taken by {1} (as their {2}). Please choose a different nickname.
rp.nickname.success.selfSet: Okay, your nickname is set to {0}
rp.nickname.target.noNickname: Player {0} does not have a nickname! You can set it with `/adminsetnick {0} NewNickname`
rp.nickname.warning.conflict: WARNING: The nickname '{0}' conflicts with {1} (as their {2}). This can cause confusion and weird behavior. Consider using a different nickname, or if you really want to proceed, use `/adminsetnick {3} force {4}` to override this warning.
rp.nickname.adminSet: Player {0} nickname has been set to: {1}. Old nickname: {2}{3}
rp.rptext.status: RP Text is now {0} for your messages.
rp.oocToggle.error.disabled: OOC chat toggle is disabled on this server.
tpa.gear.returnedHand: Your temporal gear has been returned to your hand.
tpa.gear.dropped: Your temporal gear has been dropped on the ground since your inventory and hands are full.
tpa.notification.targetTimeout: TPA request from {0} has timed out.
tpa.notification.accepted: Your teleport request has been accepted!
tpa.expire.timeout: Your TPA request to {0} has timed out.
tpa.expire.denied: Your teleport request has been denied!
tpa.expire.rejoin: Your temporal gear from a timed-out TPA request has been returned!
tpa.expire.cancelled: Your TPA request to {0} has been cancelled.
tpa.expire.generic: Your TPA request has been cancelled.
tpa.expire.gearReturned: Your temporal gear has been returned.
tpa.expire.gearFailed: Failed to return your temporal gear. (This may be a mod bug.)
tpa.privilege.description: Ability to use the /tpa and /tpahere commands
tpa.command.tpa.description: Request a teleport to another player
tpa.command.tpahere.description: Request to teleport another player to you
tpa.command.tpaccept.description: Accept a teleport request. Specify player name/nickname if you have multiple requests
tpa.command.tpdeny.description: Deny a teleport request. Specify player name/nickname if you have multiple requests
tpa.command.tpallow.description: Allow or deny all teleport requests from other players
tpa.error.requiresGear: You must hold a temporal gear to initiate a teleport request. (This will consume it)
tpa.error.cooldown: Please wait {0} hours between teleport requests.
tpa.error.targetDisabled: Player has teleport requests from other players disabled.
tpa.error.existingOutgoing: You already have an outgoing request to {0} {1} (expires in {2}). Use /tpacancel to cancel it.
tpa.error.consumeGear: Failed to consume temporal gear. Please try again.
tpa.error.multipleRequests: You have multiple teleport requests from: {0}. Please specify which one to {1}: /tp{2} [player]
tpa.request.summary.bring: wants to bring you to them
tpa.request.message.bring: {0} has requested to bring you to them.
tpa.request.message.goto: {0} has requested to teleport to you.
tpa.request.instructions.withlist: Type `/tpalist` to see all requests, `/tpaccept` to accept, or `/tpdeny` to deny.
tpa.request.instructions.simple: Type `/tpaccept` to accept, or `/tpdeny` to deny.
tpa.success.requestSent: Teleport request has been sent to {0}.
tpa.success.denied: You have denied the teleport request from {0}.
tpa.success.cancel.none: No outgoing teleport request to cancel.
tpa.success.cancelled: Your teleport request has been cancelled.
tpa.list.none: You have no incoming teleport requests.
